text:
[Verse]
Woke up this morning
Sunshine on my street
Birds are singing sweet
Life feels so complete

[Verse 2]
Kids are playing games
Smile on every face
Laughter in the air
No worries
No chase

[Chorus]
Sunshine in my heart
Every day's a new start
Love is all around
Peace in every sound

[Verse 3]
Neighbors saying hi
Waves from passersby
Warmth in every glance
Life feels like a dance

[Verse 4]
Golden rays so bright
Chasing away the night
Holding hands and sway
In this perfect day

[Chorus]
Sunshine in my heart
Every day's a new start
Love is all around
Peace in every sound
title: Sunshine on My Street
